alert.note: Alert for Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 03 at 12:02AM PST until January 04 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM PST THIS MORNING UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sustained northwest winds 25 to 35 mph, with gusts near 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Mojave Desert Slopes. * WHEN...From 7 AM PST this morning until 4 AM PST Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Blowing dust will reduce visibilities at times. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highway affected include, but are not limited to Highway 14, Highway 178 below Walker Pass, and Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
